actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration Policy and Enforcement.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement

official_title: To include the county of Mohave, in the State of Arizona, as an affected area for purposes of making claims under the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act based on exposure to atmospheric nuclear testing.
short_title: Mohave County Radiation Compensation Act of 2011

summary.text: Mohave County Radiation Compensation Act of 2011 - Amends the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act to include the county of Mohave, Arizona, among affected areas for purposes of payments to individuals with certain medical conditions who were exposed to fallout emitted during the U.S. government's atmospheric nuclear tests.

titles.title: Mohave County Radiation Compensation Act of 2011
Mohave County Radiation Compensation Act of 2011

To include the county of Mohave, in the State of Arizona, as an affected area for purposes of making claims under the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act based on exposure to atmospheric nuclear testing.
